text:
MEDIA RELEASE: We are horrified and enraged as Ontario forces COVID-19 positive migrant farmworkers to keep working. @fordnation has responded to 3 deaths by signing a death warrant for more migrant. Migrants will get sicker, keep infecting others, and more will die.

#OnPoli https://t.co/rOmtkxHa62
